text:
My life's purpose is to
bring people together.

The idea of community and
being part of something

larger than just
myself has always

been really important
to me, and I

think it's the reason
I'm here at HBS,

and how I'll go on to make a
difference in the world after I
graduate.

When I think about the memories
that are most special to me,

a lot of them have to do
with being part of a team,
or a club, or a section.

And that's amazing, but not
everyone has the opportunity

to feel connected or
included, and that's where
I try to make a difference.

I devote my time to community
engagement, recruiting,

and retention because I want to
help people find their people
and find their place.

Especially those
who for too long

had been excluded
or disadvantaged

because of their backgrounds
or where they grew up.

I want to see a world where,
no matter who you are,

you have the opportunity
to get in the door, access

new networks and
communities, and ultimately,
know that you belong.

And I'm committed to
making that happen.
